renderedFields.description:
Bug Description

The application is experiencing intermittent crashes when processing large datasets.

Steps to Reproduce

  1. Upload a file larger than 100MB
  2. Start processing
  3. Observe crash after ~5 minutes

Error logs are attached: error_log.txt
